subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Few coaches prepare their teams to win in March as consistently as Tom Izzo, through 16 consecutive N.C.A.A. tournament bids, 6 Final Fours and a national title (in 2000).
snippet: Few coaches prepare their teams to win in March as consistently as Tom Izzo, through 16 consecutive N.C.A.A. tournament bids, 6 Final Fours and a national title (in 2000).
